titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Department of Athletics, Yale University, Records Documenting Wrestling
Department of Athletics, Yale University, Records Documenting Wrestling
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:34

did.unittitle: Department of Athletics, Yale University, records documenting wrestling

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, topical files, reports, scorecards, and scrapbooks, maintained by the Yale University Department of Athletics, documenting wrestling at Yale.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 38-B (YRG 38-B), Records documenting specific sports at Yale.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the Department of Athletics, 2005.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The records are partially restricted. See inventory for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Athletics, Yale University, Records Documenting Wrestling (RU 944). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, topical files, reports, scorecards, and scrapbooks, maintained by the Yale University Department of Athletics, documenting wrestling at Yale.
Sensitive content in this finding aid has been redacted to prevent disclosure. Unredacted finding aid restricted to office of origin only.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Scrapbooks are available on microfilm. Patrons must use HM FILM 192 instead of the original scrapbooks.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Unredacted PDF version of finding aid [office of origin only].
